targets.expr: sum by (type, camera) (sum_over_time(blueiris_ai_duration_distinct{type=~"$type", camera=~"$camera"}[$__range])) / sum by (type, camera) (count_over_time(blueiris_ai_duration_distinct{type=~"$type", camera=~"$camera"}[$__range]))

panels.description: blueiris_exporter was unable to parse one of the lines in the blue iris log file. Open an issue on https://github.com/wymangr/blueiris_exporter
panels.title: Parse Errors
